title: A relation of a conference held about religion at London, the third of April, 1676 by Edw. Stillingfleet ... and Gilbert Burnet, with some gentlemen of the Church of Rome.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
